basics.name: Eric Thomas
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Professional full-stack engineer full of charisma and a passion for project completion.

work.summary: Pardot is a B2B marketing automation platform that enables marketers to operate their entire business with tight integration with Salesforce. Primary role was dedicated to building Engagement Studio, a highly interactive, fun to use application to visualize potential prospects into buyers.
highlights: Modern ES6 Javascript development built primarly with Ember.js and d3.js
Extensive test coverage and bullet-proof code reviews
Strengthed communication with product managers, UX/UI, engineers, and customers
Practiced hardened agile principles by fostering team coordination and morale serving as part-time scrum master

work.summary: Core development on Faspex, a Rails and AngularJS application to transmit very large files over a UDP protocol with reliability and security in mind.
highlights: Championed rapid iteration on both sides of the web development stack
Improved test coverage significantly with RSpec, Jasmine, Capybara, and Selenium
Executed migration from Rails 2.3 to 3.1.0 and Ruby 1.8.7 to 1.9.3
Accelerated deployment of patches for security vulnerabilities

work.summary: Contributed in building DESIREE, a simulated air traffic environment used to recreate past, present, and future airspaces.
highlights: Advanced Datalink, a simulated "text messaging" system between controller and pilot to replace voice-only communications
Wrote various data capturing plugins to calculate air traffic within a given region of airspace
Migrated system from 32 bit to 64 bit architecture

volunteer.summary: Community driven project to reclaim missing gloves for the homeless
Trail crew volunteer on the Continental Divide Trail for the last four summers

interests.name: Trail running, alpine climbing, backpacking, volunteering, karaoke, breakfast, and microbrews.
